about.heading: About
about.intro: I'm 18 years old and looking for an 8 to 10 week internship in software development.
about.journey: I've been developing for over 8 years, starting with Minecraft mods, then Roblox where I led freelance projects through Fiverr.
about.interests: Today, I'm interested in reverse engineering, C++ and software security, while strengthening my web development skills.

experience.fiverr.description: Development of over 50 games for more than 40 clients on the Roblox platform, using Luau (typed version of Lua).
